summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Indicates the behavior of a live source filter.

member.name: _AM_PUSHSOURCE_FLAGS.AM_PUSHSOURCECAPS_INTERNAL_RM
member.summary: The filter uses its own rate-matching mechanism; the renderer should therefore not attempt to match rates with this filter.

member.name: _AM_PUSHSOURCE_FLAGS.AM_PUSHSOURCECAPS_NOT_LIVE
member.summary: The filter is not live. Do not treat it as a live source, even though it exposes the interface.

member.name: _AM_PUSHSOURCE_FLAGS.AM_PUSHSOURCECAPS_PRIVATE_CLOCK
member.summary: The filter time stamps the samples using a private clock. The clock is not available to the rest of the graph through .
